text:
Clicking the demo link on the batik home page kills the browser on IE7.  
browser exits immediately, no warnings or errors are displayed.
creator: thekleppingers@yahoo.com

text:
Googling around it seems that IE7 has some problem with Java applets sometimes.
 Have you tried updating to the latest JRE from Sun?

I don't have an IE7 to test on unfortunately.  If you manage to find a way to
tweak the HTML so that IE7 won't crash on it, please let me know and I'll update
the webpage.
creator: cam@apache.org

text:
I have access to IE7 now, and can't reproduce this with my setup.  I'm using 
the Sun 1.6.0_03-b05 plugin.

I'm marking the bug WORKSFORME.  Please re-open it if you can find a reliable 
way to reproduce the problem.  (Although even then, I'm not sure what I could 
do to work around it.)
creator: cam@apache.org
